mapper.select:
SELECT far.approved_result, f.`code`, f.fault_phenomenon, far.solution, far.create_time FROM fault_analysis_report far LEFT JOIN fault f ON f.CODE = far.fault_code LEFT JOIN fault_type ft on ft.`code` = f.fault_type_code WHERE far.del_flag = 0
and f.`code` LIKE concat('%',#{condition.faultCode},'%')
and f.fault_phenomenon LIKE concat('%',#{condition.faultPhenomenon}',%')
and ft.`code` like concat('%',#{condition.faultTypeCode},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(far.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{condition.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(far.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{condition.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT f.id, f.`code`, f.sub_system_code, f.fault_applicant, ( select group_concat(d.name) from (select device_code from fault_device where fault_code = f.`code`) a left join device d on d.`code` = a.device_code) as deviceName, f.station_code, f.station_position_code, f.fault_phenomenon, f.happen_time FROM fault f left join fault_analysis_report far on far.fault_code = f.`code` where f.id = #{id}
